title: The Threateners
description: Matt Helm's first new adventure in three years--his 26th thrilling mystery. A group of renegade American agents plans to smash the cartel of a ruthless South American drug lord--by any means necessary. And Helm finds himself caught in the middle of a war between cocaine cowboys and killer G-men, knowing he's bound to catch hell no matter which way he turns. Original.
author: Donald Hamilton
